name: Teufelsberg Parkour
description:
Teufelsberg (German -- "Devil's Mountain")  is a 80 meter man-made hill of rubble, covering the once under-construction Nazi military-technical college following WWII.  During the Cold War, there was a U.S. listening station on the hill, Field Station Berlin.

In this game, you Run and Jump your way over a re-creation of the now abandoned buildings.

"W", "S", "A", "D" move forward and back as normal.  "Left Shift" to Run, "Space" to Jump. Mouse to look and steer.

There *IS* a way to get to all the interesting places, though it may not be obvious.  (I think there are only 2, small, isolated towers you can't get to the top of.)
